CustomField.description: The agreement Id of the root. A root agreement is the primordial agreement which has all of the children, grandchildren, etc. in the hierarchy. There can be only one root agreement for a hierarchy. Root > Parent > Leaf
CustomField.inlineHelpText: The agreement Id of the root. A root agreement is the primordial agreement which has all of the children, grandchildren, etc. in the hierarchy. There can be only one root agreement for a hierarchy. Root > Parent > Leaf
CustomField.label: Agreement Root
